group.group_content:
Editor’s Welcome

Welcome to Street Life’s live and intimate celebration of the 200th edition of (1)………

In the next few pages, we have a special feature to let you meet the luminaries who have made great contributions to our magazine. These special people will also entertain you this Friday, October 27, at the Street Life 200th Edition Gala Celebration at Queen’s Quay, Toronto. Of you can’t physically be there tonight, settle back, and enjoy our magazine, and try to (2)……… some of these talented artists the next time they are in your area.

So as the curtains go up on the night of nights – Street life’s celebration of 200 fabulous editions – please raise your glass to Toronto’s most popular magazine.

Here’s to (3)……… 200 editions.

Carl Steven

Pet Dislikes of Urban Life

According to a survey conducted by the city of Boston, traffic, pollution and noise were found to be the least (1)……… aspects of living in the city.

The (2)………, administered as part of the city’s local action plan, asked the citizens of Boston about their likes and dislikes of their surroundings.

The results of the survey communicated proximity 27.02 percent and community character/village feel 11.54 percent to be at the top of the list of things most liked about city life.

On the other hand, traffic (10.22 percent), general noise (9.98 percent), and parking (7.52 percent) within the main core of the city were the (3)……… attractive parts of living in the city.

WANTED
DESIGNER FOR 3D SYMPHONY MAGAZINE

London’s premier classical music magazine, 3D Symphony, is seeking a designer to join our team.
The ideal candidate is someone (1)……… qualifications must include a working knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite 2 (In design, Adobe Acrobat, Photoshop and illustration) on a MAC OS X platform. An understanding of magazine layout, press ad design, and pre-press will be highly (2)………

The position is part-time form Wednesday to Friday, and the person must be able to work to the pressure of strict deadlines. The candidate must also be reliable and possess a keen eye for detail. If selected, you’ll have the advantage of working within a young and dynamic team (3)………

Expressions of interest can be emailed to Joan@threedsynphony.com

Terry,</br></br>
I believe you should by now have received the copy of our company profile that we (1)……… in our last meeting. In it you will find the necessary information you requested. If you still haven’t received it, please feel free to contact me.</br></br>
Anyway, to keep the ball rolling, our chairman, Mr. Langley would like to have a meeting with Ms. Russell and/or you in Detroit on any date from March 20th to March 24th to have a further discussion on the (2)……… of our cooperation.</br></br>
Those dates have been chosen since Mr. Langley will be travelling extensively in (3)……… March and April. However, if our suggested dates do not suit Ms. Russell, then please let us know your preferred date for the meeting.</br></br>
Best regards,</br> Wayne</br>
